forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow. Mostly cloudy. Low around 26, with temperatures rising to around 28 overnight. West northwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Chance Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before 7am, then a chance of snow showers. Mostly sunny. High near 34, with temperatures falling to around 32 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 12 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Snow Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 20. West wind 3 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

nubsNob.comments: We are going to open the Lodge, General Store, Tune Center, Cafeteria and Pub on Black Friday and Small Business Saturday. Doors will be open from 9:00 â€“ 4:00 both days, with the Michigan-Ohio State game on in the pub. Early season tuning specials run through November 29. Get your skis and boards in soon! The General Store also has many great gift ideas for the skier on your list.
